class.name: pal/position_controllers/JointSplineController
class.description: The JointSplineController executes joint-space trajectories on a set of joints. This variant represents trajectory segments as quintic splines and sends commands to a position interface.

class.name: pal/velocity_controllers/JointSplineController
class.description: The JointSplineController executes joint-space trajectories on a set of joints. This variant represents trajectory segments as quintic splines and sends commands to a velocity interface.

class.name: pal/effort_controllers/JointSplineController
class.description: The JointSplineController executes joint-space trajectories on a set of joints. This variant represents trajectory segments as quintic splines and sends commands to an effort interface.

class.name: pal/pos_vel_controllers/JointSplineController
class.description: The JointSplineController executes joint-space trajectories on a set of joints. This variant represents trajectory segments as quintic splines and sends commands to an pos_vel interface.

class.name: pal/pos_vel_acc_controllers/JointSplineController
class.description: The JointSplineController executes joint-space trajectories on a set of joints. This variant represents trajectory segments as quintic splines and sends commands to an spline interface.
